titleStmt.title: A fairing for young-men, or, The careless lover
titleStmt.author: C. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Grove dwelling on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: "To the tune of, He that hath most money, he is the best man."
